body_html:
@JafferWilson, what about pip install numpy mkl? If that doesn't help, then you may the environmental variable PATH. Make sure it points to the following locations:

[PythonRoot]
[PythonRoot]\Library\bin
[PythonRoot]\Scripts
[PythonRoot]\bin
%SYSTEMROOT%
body_text:
@JafferWilson, what about pip install numpy mkl? If that doesn't help, then you may the environmental variable PATH. Make sure it points to the following locations:
[PythonRoot]

[PythonRoot]\Scripts
[PythonRoot]\bin
%SYSTEMROOT%
body:
@JafferWilson, what about `pip install numpy mkl`? If that doesn't help, then you may the environmental variable `PATH`. Make sure it points to the following locations:
```
[PythonRoot]
[PythonRoot]\Library\bin
[PythonRoot]\Scripts
[PythonRoot]\bin
%SYSTEMROOT%
```
